title: Castillo de San Marcos National Monument: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks      Use Park resources and topics to enhance your classroom! Educators are encouraged to borrow a kit that includes hands-on educational materials and lesson plans for classroom-use. To reserve a trunk and schedule a pick-up and drop-off time, please call us at (904) 829-6506 ext. 233. Castillo de San Marcos Trunk Topics and Lessons Include: 1. Introduction to the Castillo de San Marcos 2. Create a Timeline of Castillo's History 3. Spanish Uniforms and their Functions 4. Form Connections with the Countries in Control of the Castillo using Maps 5. Letter Writing from a Soldier's Perspective 6. The Preservation and Importance of National Parks        Results  There are no results to show.
